titles.title: No RTO Act
No Regional Transportation Optimization Act
No RTO Act

A bill to prohibit implementation of the Regional Transportation Optimization initiative, or similar initiative from being implemented by the United States Postal Service if the Postal Regulatory Commission has determined the initiative will negatively affect rural communities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
